github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: HIGHEST PRIORITY: If the staged file path is inside /algorithms and matches <algorithm-folder>/<DD-MM-YYYY>.ts (e.g. sliding-window/23-02-2026.ts) or includes a numeric suffix (e.g. sliding-window/23-02-2026(2).ts), do NOT read the file or summarize its contents. The commit message MUST use ONLY this format: practice(<algorithm>): on <file-name>. Example: practice(dijkstra): on 25-02-2026(1).ts. For changes to utils.ts, algo.ts, or any non-/algorithms files, use conventional commit messages as described in the project guidelines.
